title: Astronomers Find a Black Hole in Our Cosmic Back Yard
description: Just 1,600 light-years away, the black hole is the closest known to Earth. The good news: It’s dormant, at least for now.
dc:creator: Dennis Overbye
category: Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society (Journal)

media:content.media:description: An artist’s impression of the black hole and its companion star, a mere 1,600 light-years away from Earth.
